objects.description: [Dragonfly 2.0](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Group/G0006) has been reported to take screenshots of the GUI for ICS equipment, such as HMIs.(Citation: CISA TA18-074A March 2018)

external_references.description: Cybersecurity & Infrastructure Security Agency. (2018, March 15). Alert (TA18-074A) Russian Government Cyber Activity Targeting Energy and Other Critical Infrastructure Sectors. Retrieved October 11, 2019.
